context.rdfs:comment:
An offer to transfer some rights to an item or to provide a service â€” for example, an offer to sell tickets to an event, to rent the DVD of a movie, to stream a TV show over the internet, to repair a motorcycle, or to loan a book.

For GTIN-related fields, see Check Digit calculator and validation guide from GS1.
context.rdfs:label: Offer

properties.rdfs:comment: The date after which the price is no longer available.
properties.rdfs:label: priceValidUntil

properties.rdfs:comment: An additional offer that can only be obtained in combination with the first base offer (e.g. supplements and extensions that are available for a surcharge).
properties.rdfs:label: addOn

properties.rdfs:comment: A pointer to the organization or person making the offer.
properties.rdfs:label: offeredBy
